item.title: Learning experience
item.dc:creator: @LeScape LeScape
item.description:
@LeScape wrote:

Examine the following:

public class doubleArrays {
	public static void main (String[] args) {
		String[][] variable {{"I", "You"}{"Am", "Are"}{"Happy", "Sad}};
		System.out.println(variable[0][0] + variable[1][0] + variable[2][0]);
		System.out.println(variable[0][1] + variable[1][1] + variable[2][1]); 
	}
}

The output of this program is:

I Am Happy You Are Sad
Now, all this is really showing you is that you can put an array within an array by simply putting 2 "[]" next to the data type instead of 1; you must also reference the String with "[][]" as well.

Read full topic
